name: Restless Place
description:
Restless Place A 2018 GitHub Game Off game Synopsis

Awaken in a strange but familiar place, aching all over, driven by an unknown force. Drag your ragged bones from the place of a hasty burial on a remote property to a more peaceful final end. Jab, slash, and smash your way through dark forces to finally arrive at your intended destination in our dark, beat'em up-inspired game, Restless Place.

Controls
  • Controller recommended
    • Control stick or D-pad to move
    • (A) button to attack
  • Keyboard supported
    • WASD
    • CTRL to attack
